咬死鄭俊弘隻冚家富貴啦！

害狗不淺電帶及釘帶


　　近來接觸的個案，不少狗隻都曾經使用電帶或釘帶，而狗隻不約而同在停用半年至一年之後，出現嚴重的後遺症。
　　

　　一頭拉布拉多犬，對女主人的頸項大動脈位置狂咬，主人被送進醫院。另一頭同樣是拉布拉多犬，主人在離家一段路上，使用電帶操控，命狗隻不得聞草地及接觸其他狗隻，以致牠對離家的路段非常恐懼，見到其他狗隻，還怕得雙腿發震，甚至一條被風吹起的草碰到牠鼻尖，都會把牠嚇怕。
　　

　　相信沒多少狗主曾親身試用，電帶最可怕的，不但是強勁的電擊，還有那不知何時又再被電擊的恐懼，為狗隻帶來莫大的精神壓力。第二頭狗隻的主人，知道使用電帶對愛犬帶來精神上的虐待，對自己責備不已。另一頭巨型的伯恩山犬，主人沒有學好拖繩，硬為狗隻戴上釘帶，那頭狗連釘帶扯到自己皮開肉破都不管，硬是要拖主人而行。


　　訓犬當然是必須的，但這樣傷害狗隻的方式絕不可取。在我而言，只需要使用Choke Chain或半Choke Chain，加上左手兩隻手指輕輕一剔，讓狗隻知道牠前腳不能超越我雙腳，牠便明白牽狗這人是領袖，而狗隻天生對領袖絕對服從，再加一點零食獎勵，一頭既服從又開心的狗便誕生了。
　　

　　用對方法，害狗不淺的電帶及釘帶，必定被狗主唾棄。

鄭俊弘無拜狐仙「不信這些事」

【明報專訊】鄭俊弘今日（11月10日）34歲生日，前晚約了數十名粉絲一齊製作手工音樂盒；席間，他獲贈生日蛋糕，粉絲又大唱生日歌，變成小型生日會，非常熱鬧。鄭俊弘說：「今次整音樂盒很特別，同粉絲互動之餘，音樂盒首歌是《熊貓》，很有紀念價值。（送給女友何雁詩？）我留給自己，我個人不太識得搞浪漫，兩個人一起開心就足夠。」



提到近日的「拜狐仙」傳聞，除吳業坤外，鄭俊弘也成為嫌疑人物。他表示：「起初睇到都以為話我，但我都不太算懵懵哋。我無拜狐仙，不信這些事，亦沒特別宗教信仰，宗教只是導人向善，心地好就夠。」

記者：楊安莉

鄭俊弘無拜狐仙「不信這些事」

【明報專訊】鄭俊弘今日（11月10日）34歲生日，前晚約了數十名粉絲一齊製作手工音樂盒；席間，他獲贈生日蛋糕，粉絲又大唱生日歌，變成小型生日會，非常熱鬧。鄭俊弘說：「今次整音樂盒很特別，同粉絲互動之餘，音樂盒首歌是《熊貓》，很有紀念價值。（送給女友何雁詩？）我留給自己，我個人不太識得搞浪漫，兩個人一起開心就足夠。」



提到近日的「拜狐仙」傳聞，除吳業坤外，鄭俊弘也成為嫌疑人物。他表示：「起初睇到都以為話我，但我都不太算懵懵哋。我無拜狐仙，不信這些事，亦沒特別宗教信仰，宗教只是導人向善，心地好就夠。」

鄭俊弘無拜狐仙「不信這些事」

【明報專訊】鄭俊弘今日（11月10日）34歲生日，前晚約了數十名粉絲一齊製作手工音樂盒；席間，他獲贈生日蛋糕，粉絲又大唱生日歌，變成小型生日會，非常熱鬧。鄭俊弘說：「今次整音樂盒很特別，同粉絲互動之餘，音樂盒首歌是《熊貓》，很有紀念價值。（送給女友何雁詩？）我留給自己，我個人不太識得搞浪漫，兩個人一起開心就足夠。」



提到近日的「拜狐仙」傳聞，除吳業坤外，鄭俊弘也成為嫌疑人物。他表示：「起初睇到都以為話我，但我都不太算懵懵哋。我無拜狐仙，不信這些事，亦沒特別宗教信仰，宗教只是導人向善，心地好就夠。」

記者：楊安莉

提到近日的「拜狐仙」傳聞，除吳業坤外，鄭俊弘也成為嫌疑人物。他表示：「起初睇到都以為話我，但我都不太算懵懵哋。我無拜狐仙，不信這些事，亦沒特別宗教信仰，宗教只是導人向善，心地好就夠。」

記者：楊安莉

fredcheng83 Riley and I have been together for roughly more than 4 yrs now. When I picked him up, he was a stray dog, scared , starving, underweight and full of injuries. But through months of nourishment, medication, love and care, he became healthy happy and strong again. Throughout this time nobody came to claim him. So I took the next step and became his owner. There was an occurrence when he did not respond when I called his name and he was almost hit by a car. That was when I knew that proper training and education is very important. So I brought Riley to training school, and also I educated myself with proper training techniques and communication skills needed with Riley. Sometimes Riley can be a bit hyperactive so the trainer recommended the use of a prong collar when training. Which is a very common training tool with larger breed dogs. This is to ensure the safety of him and other dogs. I will never hurt Riley in anyway, or even ever think about giving him away or abandoning him. I don’t even see him as my dog, he’s my son, he’s family. And I only want to give him the best. We have a really deep connection and relationship. The kind that only Riley and I will understand. It’s unconditional. Riley and Stephanie get along very very well. Steph loves and cares for Riley so much. Just know that Riley is very happy and he’s safe at home where he belongs.

fredcheng83 Riley and I have been together for roughly more than 4 yrs now. When I picked him up, he was a stray dog, scared , starving, underweight and full of injuries. But through months of nourishment, medication, love and care, he became healthy happy and strong again. Throughout this time nobody came to claim him. So I took the next step and became his owner. There was an occurrence when he did not respond when I called his name and he was almost hit by a car. That was when I knew that proper training and education is very important. So I brought Riley to training school, and also I educated myself with proper training techniques and communication skills needed with Riley. Sometimes Riley can be a bit hyperactive so the trainer recommended the use of a prong collar when training. Which is a very common training tool with larger breed dogs. This is to ensure the safety of him and other dogs. I will never hurt Riley in anyway, or even ever think about giving him away or abandoning him. I don’t even see him as my dog, he’s my son, he’s family. And I only want to give him the best. We have a really deep connection and relationship. The kind that only Riley and I will understand. It’s unconditional. Riley and Stephanie get along very very well. Steph loves and cares for Riley so much. Just know that Riley is very happy and he’s safe at home where he belongs.

認俾Riley用釘帶 鄭俊弘話係常見訓練工具




鄭俊弘同何雁詩又有是非纏身，今日有周刊報道話，何雁詩唔係好接受到Fred同舊愛嘅寵物Riley，再加上Riley對住何雁詩嘅行為反叛，唔係好肯跟佢之餘，仲會吠何雁詩，搞到何雁詩都好抗拒Riley，結果Fred為咗女友，搵咗條有倒鈎嘅釘帶俾Riley，之後仲將佢送咗去親戚屋企暫住。

今朝何雁詩已經喺fb講過呢件事，佢話：「謠言止於智者，Riley好地地喺屋企瞓緊，絕無棄養。每個人也有過去，私生活不應亦不會影響狗狗與主人的關係。其實我是狗癡⋯唔係好明發生咩事⋯」但係似乎平息唔到愛狗嘅人嘅怒火，唔少人留言狂鬧！

去到中午時份，阿Fred同何雁詩分別喺ig留言再為事件解畫，Fred貼咗Riley嘅近照兼用英文留言，內容大意話：「我同Riley生活已經有有4年幾，初初抱佢返嚟嘅時候，佢只係一隻有毛病嘅流浪狗，經過幾個月嘅照顧，Riley回復健康同快樂，但係有一次我叫佢個名，佢冇理到我，仲差啲俾車撞到！」

Fred話嗰陣同Riley去咗訓練學校上堂，因為Riley有時太過活躍，於是佢喺導師嘅建議下，用咗一條釘帶(Prong Collar)，佢話：「呢個係非常常見嘅訓練工具，係為咗了確保狗隻本身，甚至其他狗嘅安全。無論如何，我永遠唔會傷害Riley，亦冇諗過會棄養佢，事實上我一早已經當咗Riley係個仔兼屋企人。」Fred亦都為女友澄清，佢話：「Step同Riley相處得很好，佢本身好鍾意同關心Riley。」

之後何雁詩亦都喺貼咗張Fred抱住兩隻狗嘅相，又係用英文留言話從來冇諗過棄養Riley，用釘帶亦為咗Riley同其他嘅安全，佢仲話：「為咗呢件事覺得好困擾，我從來都唔會棄養，本身亦同Riley相處好好，希望大家明白佢哋嘅立場，知道發生咗乜嘢事。」

fredcheng83 Riley and I have been together for roughly more than 4 yrs now. When I picked him up, he was a stray dog, scared , starving, underweight and full of injuries. But through months of nourishment, medication, love and care, he became healthy happy and strong again. Throughout this time nobody came to claim him. So I took the next step and became his owner. There was an occurrence when he did not respond when I called his name and he was almost hit by a car. That was when I knew that proper training and education is very important. So I brought Riley to training school, and also I educated myself with proper training techniques and communication skills needed with Riley. Sometimes Riley can be a bit hyperactive so the trainer recommended the use of a prong collar when training. Which is a very common training tool with larger breed dogs. This is to ensure the safety of him and other dogs. I will never hurt Riley in anyway, or even ever think about giving him away or abandoning him. I don’t even see him as my dog, he’s my son, he’s family. And I only want to give him the best. We have a really deep connection and relationship. The kind that only Riley and I will understand. fredcheng83 Riley and I have been together for roughly more than 4 yrs now. When I picked him up, he was a stray dog, scared , starving, underweight and full of injuries. But through months of nourishment, medication, love and care, he became healthy happy and strong again. Throughout this time nobody came to claim him. So I took the next step and became his owner. There was an occurrence when he did not respond when I called his name and he was almost hit by a car. That was when I knew that proper training and education is very important. So I brought Riley to training school, and also I educated myself with proper training techniques and communication skills needed with Riley. Sometimes Riley can be a bit hyperactive so the trainer recommended the use of a prong collar when training. Which is a very common training tool with larger breed dogs. This is to ensure the safety of him and other dogs. I will never hurt Riley in anyway, or even ever think about giving him away or abandoning him. I don’t even see him as my dog, he’s my son, he’s family. And I only want to give him the best. We have a really deep connection and relationship. The kind that only Riley and I will understand. It’s unconditional. Riley and Stephanie get along very very well. Steph loves and cares for Riley so much. Just know that Riley is very happy and he’s safe at home where he belongs.
